item.title: about me ðŸ¤
item.description: Hi! My name is Sam and I am a software engineer at WillowTree. I recently graduated from NC State University where I studied Computer Science. While there, I met a ton of great people and learned a lot about gratitude. I also was able to do research and assist in the potential for DNA based information storage. I’m an ambitious and optimistic team player who loves to work on teams with other driven engineers to build high-performance, inclusive, and socially impactful software.
